pullrequest.title: Updates to RemoteWorker and similar classes

content.raw:
Ok so I have questions:

* Does using `RemoteBLACS.RemoteGUI`mean that the worker and GUI are remote? I find the naming of `RemoteGUI` quite confusing. 
* I'm not sure of the role of `SecondaryControlSystem` after these changes. Is this supposed to be subclassed by a device to handle the communication on the local side? Could you think of a case where it would be needed and maybe step me through on exactly how you imagine this would be used? I can currently only think of moving gui and worker to another machine which is now covered by `RemoteBLACS` as I understand it.
content.html:
Ok so I have questions:

  • Does using RemoteBLACS.RemoteGUImean that the worker and GUI are remote? I find the naming of RemoteGUI quite confusing.
  • I'm not sure of the role of SecondaryControlSystem after these changes. Is this supposed to be subclassed by a device to handle the communication on the local side? Could you think of a case where it would be needed and maybe step me through on exactly how you imagine this would be used? I can currently only think of moving gui and worker to another machine which is now covered by RemoteBLACS as I understand it.
